duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage multiple IT security projects including procurement, implementation, and ongoing operation of the Physical Security Information Management (PSIM) Systems.
Produce project schedules & plans and coordinate between various vendors, IT, and Business groups.
Manage all aspects of the projects and achieve the required result within the timeline and budget goals.
Provide reports to Senior Management regarding the progress of the project and budget tracking.
Ensure that all applications, systems, and services meet defined security standards, comply with existing policies, and follow industry best practices.
Provide technical information, security advice, and guidance to multiple stakeholders and assist in identifying, managing, and mitigating security risks.
Occasional travel throughout the NYCT Region is required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT related field (Master's preferred)
